marklogic.body:
The biggest thing working against Romney is having to stoop down to dealing with where that primary went when it was Bachmann, Perry, Cain, Gingrich, then Santorum, then Gingrich, then Santorum as the non-Romney.Â
Those five are absolutely nuts. Â While Romney caught Heat for not being "conservative enough" meaning "not anti-Hispanic enough" in the Las Vegas debate, he still wasn't taking Strides towards winning that important demographic.Â
Now, separately, there's a crapton of Mormons in NV, NM, and CO, all swing states.Â
